thread.title: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies
thread.title_full: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies

title: Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies
text:
> Top News Hall of Fame basketball player Harry Gallatin dies FILE - In this May 11, 2015, file photo, tetired basketball great Harry Gallatin is honored at the Madison Square Garden 2015 Walk of Fame Induction ceremony in New York. Gallatin, a member of the National Basketball Hall of Fame, passed away at the age of 88, Southern Illinois University at Edwardsville announced, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. (Photo by Evan Agostini/Invision/AP, File)
